name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless Bluetooth headphones with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker
description: Track your heart rate, steps, and calories burned with this waterproof smart fitness tracker.

name: 4K Action Camera
description: Capture stunning 4K videos and photos with this compact action camera. Perfect for adventure lovers.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy high-quality sound anywhere with this compact and portable Bluetooth speaker.

name: Smartphone Gimbal Stabilizer
description: Keep your smartphone steady while recording videos with this 3-axis gimbal stabilizer.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Charge your phone effortlessly with this sleek and fast wireless charging pad.

name: Smart LED Light Bulb
description: Control your home's lighting with this smart LED light bulb that works with voice assistants.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Experience immersive sound and block out distractions with these wireless noise-cancelling earbuds.
